title: Patch 5.5 Error
body:
Hey Guys,

Since I updated League of Legends today 13/03/15 to the newest patch, I get a new error that I have never gotten before in the past... I queue, I select champion & then after I'm in game around 5 seconds in I get disconnected from the game with an error message saying '**league of legends tm client has stopped working**'.

What I Have Tried So Far:

- Repairing League of Legends Client
- Uninstalling & Reinstalling League of Legends Client
- Checking Updates for All Drivers
- Run cCleaner
- Turning Off Windows Firewall

If anyone could help fix the problem it would be great, I really have no idea what I need to do to be able to play LoL again.

replies.body: If you're running Windows 10 Preview, that's your problem, same as me. If you look around the forums or Google the issue you'll find other people in the same boat. It appears Riot are looking into a fix for the problem but there is no guarantee as to when it will be fixed.
I too have this problem and have windows 10 Preview. What do you think i should do? Changing back to windows 7 would be quite a mission. Is there any other way
Thanks friend, I knew that was the problem but didn't want to reinstall windows without someone else telling me that.
